item.text: Therefore, holy brothers and sisters, partners in a heavenly calling, take note of Jesus, the apostle and high priest whom we confess,

who <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st> to the one who <st data-num="4160" class="">appointed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> was <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846">God’s</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3624">house</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">he</st> has come to <st data-num="515" class="">deserve</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">greater</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">than</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st>, <st data-num="2596 3745">just as</st> the <st data-num="2680" class="">builder</st> of a <st data-num="846">house</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">deserves</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">greater</st> <st data-num="5092" class="">honor</st> than the <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st> itself!

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st> is <st data-num="2680" class="">built</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="2680" class="">builder</st> of <st data-num="3956">all things</st> is <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.
Now Moses was faithful in all God’s house as a servant, to testify to the things that would be spoken.
But Christ is faithful as a son over God’s house. We are of his house, if in fact we hold firmly to our confidence and the hope we take pride in.

Therefore, as the Holy Spirit says,

“Oh, that today you would listen as he speaks!
Do not harden your hearts as in the rebellion, in the day of testing in the wilderness.
There your fathers tested me and tried me, and they saw my works for forty years.
Therefore, I became provoked at that generation and said, ‘Their hearts are always wandering, and they have not known my ways.’
As I swore in my anger, ‘They will never enter my rest!’”
See to it, brothers and sisters, that none of you has an evil, unbelieving heart that forsakes the living God.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3870" class="">exhort</st> <st data-num="1438">one another</st> <st data-num="1538" class="">each</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>, <st data-num="891">as long as</st> it is <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> “<st data-num="4594">Today</st>,” <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3361 5100">none</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> may become <st data-num="4645" class="">hardened</st> by <st data-num="266">sin’s</st> <st data-num="539" class="">deception</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> we have <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> <st data-num="3353" class="">partners</st> with <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> in fact we <st data-num="2722" class="">hold</st> our <st data-num="746" class="">initial</st> <st data-num="5287" class="">confidence</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="949" class="">firm</st> <st data-num="3360" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="5056" class="">end</st>.
As it says, “Oh, that today you would listen as he speaks! Do not harden your hearts as in the rebellion.”

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5101">which ones</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> and <st data-num="3893" class="">rebelled</st>? Was it <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="1831">came out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="125" class="">Egypt</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">under</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses’</st> leadership?<n id="1" />
And against whom was God provoked for forty years? Was it not those who sinned, whose dead bodies fell in the wilderness?

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> to <st data-num="5101" class="">whom</st> did he <st data-num="3660" class="">swear</st> they would <st data-num="3361" class="">never</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2663" class="">rest</st>, <st data-num="1437 3361">except</st> those who were <st data-num="544" class="">disobedient</st>?
So we see that they could not enter because of unbelief.
